mapper.select: SELECT A.post_id , B.`name` as category, A.title , A.created_at as createdDate, A.updated_at as updatedDate, C.username FROM Posts AS A INNER JOIN Categories AS B ON A.category_id = B.category_id INNER JOIN Users AS C ON A.user_id = C.user_id;
mapper.insert: insert into Posts(category_id, user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{categoryId},#{userId},#{title},#{content},now(),now());
